title: Exposure to excessive cold of man-made origin
chapter: External causes of morbidity and mortality
block: Exposure to electric current, radiation and extreme ambient air temperature and pressure
category: Exposure to excessive cold of man-made origin
inclusion: contact with or inhalation of: dry ice
contact with or inhalation of: liquid: air
contact with or inhalation of: liquid: hydrogen
contact with or inhalation of: liquid: nitrogen
exclusion: abnormal reaction to a complication of treatment, without mention of misadventure
misadventure to patient in surgical and medical procedures
